name: ORBS (itch) (Ysopprod)
description:
Control:

- wasd or arrow keys to move
- when purple orbs are collected: mouse buttons to rotate (or "i"/"q" & "o"/"e")

Diffent Orbs give following benefits:

  • Green: Movement Speed
  • Purple: Rotation Speed
  • Yellow: Points

Watch how this game was created at: 

The music of the game was created by: https://www.freesfx.co.uk/
